Text: Its not full HD as the filename suggest btw, its 720P

I rather do other stuff... like playing games, doing my job, drink beer now and then... you know important stuff that matters :P

Why there is so many sources that questions christianity is why the west is better than the nations that Islam conquered, is because we are ALLOWED TO QUESTION and allowed to grow our personal freedom and our own thoughts, not those that are decreed from an long dead man and his legacy of hardline male theocracy!
